title: Game crashed and can not rejoin game, help?
body: My game crashed and i had to restart my computer during a ranked game and now  can not rejoin my game? It just says game in progress in the client nowhere to let me rejoin

replies.body: We've been seeing an abnormal amount of ghost games today, and it sounds like this might be the issue you were having. Let me know if you still haven't been able to get back in the game normally and I can take a closer look, but things should be smoothed out by this point.
